title: Wolfson History Prize 2015 special
itunes:title: Wolfson History Prize 2015 special
itunes:subtitle: The winners of this year's Wolfson History Prize, Richard Vinen and Alexander Watson, join Rob Attar for a discussion about their books on the First World War and national service.   See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-...
description:
The winners of this year's Wolfson History Prize, Richard Vinen and Alexander Watson, join Rob Attar for a discussion about their books on the First World War and national service. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
